projects.name: Simplify Captcha
projects.description: Modern React CAPTCHA component with intelligent behavior analysis, gesture tracking, and advanced fallback verification. Provides real-time mouse, touch, keyboard, and scroll analysis to distinguish humans from bots. No CSS imports required.
projects.responsibilities: Developed a reusable CAPTCHA component with intelligent human verification, advanced gesture and behavior analysis, SVG-based rendering, and seamless integration for React apps.

projects.name: Amalgamate
projects.description: React Native-based social media application with Votes, Shorts, Chat and Social.
projects.responsibilities: UI implementation from Figma Design, API integration, and Bug Management.

projects.name: My Cash Book
projects.description: React Native-based Accounting and GST mobile application for small and medium businesses.
projects.responsibilities: UI implementation from Figma Design, API integration, and Bug Management.

projects.name: Phaeton Bond Marketplace
projects.description: This web app is a public blockchain-based marketplace that helps users buy and sell bonds.
projects.responsibilities: UI implementation from Figma Design, API integration, Web3 & Metamask integration, and Bug Management.

projects.name: Phaeton Identity Dashboard
projects.description: This web app is a dashboard that helps users manage registration and onboarding in Phaeton Blockchain.
projects.responsibilities: Project Structure, UI implementation from Figma Design, API integration, Web3 & Metamask integration, and Bug Management.

projects.name: Smart Health Card
projects.description: This Application is an extended and temporary rewrite of the NKDA Citizen Covid App, it includes measuring and recording health statistics, reports, and prescriptions, as well as setting medication reminders, and checking the news.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: NKDA SWM Scanner
projects.description: This application is used to scan a card and update data regarding location and time by identifying the card with NFC.
projects.responsibilities: Updated APIs, business logic.

projects.name: Smart Card Verifier
projects.description: SmartCard Verifier application is used to verify the Smart tags installed in designated houses/places with their geolocation and image.
projects.responsibilities: Forked NKDA_SWM_Scanner, Updated UI, APIs and implemented business logic.

projects.name: NKDA Smart Home Tags Dashboard
projects.description: The motive of this project is to prepare a dashboard to show the information, statistics and visualize the same in eye pleasing manner. The dashboard here will consume data from multiple different kind of services and display them in one place.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: WBPCB ANMS Dashboard
projects.description: This Dashboard displays the Noise Pollution data from REST APIs in Maps, Charts, and Datagrid. Multiple instances are deployed with mock logins.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: NKDA Air Quality Dashboard
projects.description: This is a web-based dashboard to display Air Quality Information in an eye-pleasing manner by consuming REST APIs.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: WBPCB Paribesh App Admin Panel
projects.description: This Web-based dashboard is for administrative works of the Paribesh Mobile App.
projects.responsibilities: Added new features and UI. Fixed some prevalent bugs.

projects.name: WBPCB Paribesh App
projects.description: This Application is a rewrite of the existing Paribesh app (but not a fork) is used to provide pollution-related data, forms for lodging complaints, and some events regarding WBPCB.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI, as well as OTA Update.

projects.name: NKDA Parking Assistant
projects.description: This Application is used to provide information and actions to help the attendees in Parking Lots to check and manage the space in parking as well as calculate and collect an appropriate fee.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, and Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: Paribesh Tree Image Uploader
projects.description: This Application is used to capture images of a planted tree and upload its picture with its location and other details fed by the operator.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, and Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: NKDA Citizen Covid App
projects.description: This Application is to help citizens update their information on health conditions, request sanitization or desolation, and get information and guidelines.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI, as well as OTA Update.

projects.name: NKDA Sanitization Worker App
projects.description: This Application is to help the sanitization workers to get their assignments, and capture and submit images with locations to confirm their work.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI, as well as OTA Update.

projects.name: NKDA Trams
projects.description: This Application displays the trams, tram stations, and tram routes as well as historical information on trams.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI as well as OTA Updates.

projects.name: WBTC Trams
projects.description: This Application is rewrite of NKDA Trams, it displays the trams, tram stations and tram routes as well as historical information on trams. Development is on hold due to dependency on APIs which are yet to be done.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: WBPCB Command & Control Center
projects.description: This Dashboard displays the information collected from multiple sources and administrative works, reports, manage master data.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed some Components and UI.

projects.name: PIS MQTT Tabular Dashboard
projects.description: This Dashboard displays live information from MQTT services on PIS systems.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: Display Configuration Dashboard
projects.description: This is a Drag'n'Drop web-based dashboard to feed data to display in their appropriate display boards as well as customize the content to be displayed at display boards.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: Quest Mall Display
projects.description: This is a rewrite in React of Quest Mall Display with additional features such as present Google Slides or videos stored in Google Drive with a schedule and interval.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: WBPCB ANMS Display
projects.description: This is a single page application which could display a customized content while updating some data with an interval.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: Radio New Town
projects.description: This is an internet radio app that lets the user listen to the channel by Newtown.
projects.responsibilities: Added Stop and Play features to the app with button controls as well as background play and a widget in the notification bar.

projects.name: React Clock Counter
projects.description: This library provides a hook to create a counter with custom DateTime and update the clock on the provided interval.
projects.responsibilities: Developed this library from scratch using the Create React library module.

projects.name: React Native Dropdown Step
projects.description: An easy-to-use dropdown step component for React Native.
projects.responsibilities: Developed this library from scratch using the Create React library module.

projects.name: 16 Ana Bangalee Client
projects.description: A food delivery application for a restaurant.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI.

projects.name: Bioflow: Biobanking Monitoring System
projects.description: BioFlow is a platform software for RoboCell (real robot).
projects.responsibilities: UI implementation from Figma Design, API integration, and Bug Management.

projects.name: 16 Ana Bangalee Vendor
projects.description: This application lets the admin track and manage orders, and edit, add, and delete food products.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and implemented the system architecture, Integrated APIs, Developed Components and UI, as well as OTA Update.
